text: Takht-I-Bhai railway station () is located in town of Takht-i-Bahi, Mardan District, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Mardan District Category:Railway stations on Nowshera–Dargai Railway Line Category:Defunct railway stations in Mardan District
title: Takht-I-Bhai railway station
